column1: fullish ball, comes forward and pushes it uppishly through the covers region for a brace
fuller and outside off, punches it crunchily back to the bowler
short of a length and skids through, little bit of nibble into the right-hander, defended back to the bowler
jags back in to the right-hander from the back of a length area again and it is pushed from the crease to mid-on before they take off for a quick single
short of a length, no movement on this one and it comes on straight just outside off, blocked into the off side

through the defences, or is it? Hasan gets this one to nibble in sharply again and it beats the inside edge and goes to the wicketkeeper. There is a slight noise and a half appeal for a caught behind, but the umpire is not convinced. Seems like it went off the pad

and straight away he gets a wicket. This is brilliantly bowled. What a delivery to start off things. Draws Shafiq out of the crease and the batsman obliges. Comes a good way down the track but picks the wrong line. The ball drifts away from him and dips on him before spinning away to comprehensively beat him. Kamran Akmal does the rest
goes for the big sweep and gets hit on the pad. Had the front leg a long way across and the impact was outside off
comes down the track to meet the pitch of this ball before turning it away just to the right of mid-on
loopy and pitched up. Angling in on middle and off and it is bunted into the off side

holes out to extra cover. Shehzad gives the spinner the charge and tries to loft him down the ground. But he does not account for the sharp turn, the ball is going a long way away from him which means he fails to get on top of it and skews it off the splice of the blade. Sohaib Maqsood settles under it
floated up on middle and spinning away, Pietersen crunches a drive to extra cover. Top over from Asghar
comes down the track and works it to mid-on

oh, dear. Comes down the track but this one drifts in with the arm and hits him on the pad. Narrowly misses the stumps as it rolls away off the pad towards the fine leg region. He was a long way down so it was always going to make it hard for the lbw to come into play

chance at first slip, put down. Rossouw brings out the reverse sweep and skews it off the top edge to Sammy who is moving the wrong way to his left, too late to make amends as he puts a hand to it after stretching as he cannot hold on to it
pitched up, defended off the front foot
fullish in length again, dabs it into the leg side. No run there
turn and bounce but also short and wide. Pietersen slaps it hard off the backfoot past extra cover where the fielder dives but the ball beats him and does into the boundary
past the diving extra cover fielder again. Short and wide and it is punched firmly off the backfoot, long-off runs across and tidies up
good length. Tossed up and drifting in before straightening. Pietersen has his feet firmly planted inside as he defends, chops it hard into the turf as he does so
good length and spinning away outside off, left alone
shifts back and across to protect the off-stump before smothering the spin and defending this one back towards the bowler
length ball on off, punched through covers. Two fielders giving it a chase and one of them gets down and manages to pull it back before the ropes
goes on with the arm and Pietersen backs away to cut but not enough room and he cannot find the gap in the off side
comes down the track and the ball goes off the pad back to the bowler. He was moving across outside off to that one
short and wide, cut off the backfoot past the diving cover fielder

too short and too wide again, the pitch is so slow that he has all the time in the world. Shifts back to use the depth of the crease before laying into a cut shot. Picks the gap through covers perfectly
shifts back and makes room, does not get hold of all of it as he works it out to long-off
comes down the track, keeps a bit low and he does not entirely manage to get on top of that one as he nudges it away through the midwicket region
good length ball, rushes him with pace and the ball cuts back in to rap him on the thigh guard. Optimistic appeal for lbw but that was missing leg. Height also a factor as it hit him on the flap
short of a length on leg and middle, stays in the crease and whips it away to midwicket
tries to whip it hard through the leg side but cannot beat the midwicket fielder
goes hard as he tries to flay this length ball through the off side but the ball goes on the bounce and drops in front of point
short of good length on the pads, tucked off them to the deep fine leg boundary

could have nearly holed out there. Full and angling away outside off, gets the front leg out of the way to give himself enough room and launches it over the off side. Does not entirely get hold of it and the ball lands short of the deep point fielder running across to his left. Wahab not entirely pleased with that effort
length ball on off, punched to the left of the bowler and the ball goes to mid-on
length on off, opens up a bit and slogs it out to cow corner. No one in the deep
gets down to scoop and uses the pace on that delivery as he goes down on one knee and lifts it over and behind, gets it well past the short fine leg fielder and into the boundary
cutter outside off, tries to flick it away and is deceived completely. Walks into the shot and gets beaten
just short of Sammy at mid-off. Short of a length on off, moves away to make room before flaying it with a flat bat. Cannot get hold of it and the ball goes on the bounce to the mid-off fielder

short ball, sitting up nicely for Pietersen who swivels around and pulls. The ball seems to be going to the square leg boundary but deft footwork from Shakib as he plants the right foot across to stop the ball just in front of the boundary after running across from deep midwicket
fullish and pushed across, gets down to scoop but fails to make proper connection, the ball hardly goes any distance and falls short of the short fine leg fielder running in
driven off the front foot to covers
similar ball, similar shot. Fullish and crunches a drive to covers
and this one is drilled off the front foot to the bowler and Afridi gets down to the right to field it. Afridi nicely building up the pressure as Rossouw is struggling to get going
you could see this coming. He was desperate to get going and comes charging down the trac to go for a big slog. Ends up getting an inside edge that goes to short fine leg
opens the face of his bat as he sees some width being offered up outside off but cannot beat short third man. Terrific over from Afridi. Maiden. Will the dots lead to a dismissal?

that has split the gap beautifully. Generously flighted outside off and he absolutely lays into a drive that goes wide of extra cover. Long-off darts across but that was hammered and no chance for the fielder
length on off, cut through cover-point
fullish length ball outside off, Rossouw shifts back in the crease and turns it away into the on side. Shakib runs across and collects it
down the trac kand looking to whip it away to the on side but the drift on this one takes it in to him and he gets rapped on the pads. Was down by a fair distance, so stifled appeal for lbw not given
fuller ball, driven back to the bowler
driven through covers and he will keep the strike
turn outside off and some bounce as well, steered off the backfoot square of the wicket

what a blow that is. Punches this length ball and lifts it over extra cover. Just presents the full face of his bat and the timing on that carries the ball all the way. Holds the pose with the straight bat as he finishes the shot
gets down to sweep early but it is not full enough. On a length and spinning in and he gets it off the top edge as the ball lands in front of deep backward square leg

comes down the track and looks to clip it away through the leg side but he has got that off the pad. Drifting in with the arm and raps him on the pad and goes to the fine leg boundary. Almost fell off as he played that one
driven but cannot find the gap in the covers region
short of a length, middle and leg, swivels around and pulls to deep midwicket
comes down the track and looks to slog over the leg side but ends up dragging it behind square off the inside part of the blade
drifting in with the arm and strikes him on the pad as he misses the big slog. Pitching outside leg and lots of turn and it probably saved him there
clipped off the pads to deep midwicket, long-on runs forward and picks it up. It gives them enough time to complete two runs
goes for a reverse paddle sweep and ends up missing and getting hit on the pads
slog sweep, top edge, luckily for Rossouw, it lands short of deep midwicket running across and is fielded in front of the deep square leg boundary
short of a length, swivels around and pulls to deep midwicket
clipped into the midwicket region and Rossouw wants a second but is sent back by Pietersen
short ball, down the leg side, misses the attempted pull
length ball on off, lofts it and the ball goes on the bounce to long-on
short of a length, tries to pull it away but it does not sit up to his liking and Rososuw ends up dragging it down to long-on

good length, angling away outside off, it's the cutter and spins away like an orthodox left-arm spinner's delivery as it cuts off the seam after landing and misses the flashing blade of KP who was looking to heave it away
back of a length on off, cramps him for room and it is worked to sweeper cover
down the leg side, goes for a slog sweep. Misses and wears it on the pad before the ball rolls away to fine leg
tries to pull but is through with the shot a tad early and gets it off the glove to the fine leg region
cut out to point off the backfoot
Afridi pitches outside leg stump, spins sharply, Pietersen reverse sweeps for a boundary
flighted and pitching on middle, revserse dabbed again, this time just a single
tucked into the leg side
short ball, rocks back and lays into a pull shot and the ball clears the cow corner boundary comfortably. Sat up nicely and that was pummelled flat
slog sweep, does not get hold of it entirely and the ball goes along the ground to long-on
drifting in on the pads with the arm, misses the attempted flick and kisses the pad of Pietersen as the ball goes down to fine leg

steps out of the crease and slogs again but this time he does not get hold of it entirely. It was wide outside off, meaning he had to drag it from wide of his reach. Gives it a good thump but not good enough to clear the man running across from long-on
sprays it down the leg side
tries to flick and gets a leading edge that goes to cover
width outside off, slaps it gently out to deep point
goes for a reverse sweep but gets an inside edge to the pad and the ball goes to short third man. Appeal from Afridi, turned down

chance at deep midwicket, not taken. Oh, dear! Hafeez and Hasan Ali converge on the ball and neither of them takes it. It was a slog sweep and he skied it, did not get the elevation desired and the ball lands in the deep midwicket region. Both fielders end up looking at each other

reverse sweep. Gets it on the back leg but the impact is outside off. Afridi's screaming is lungs out in appeal but it is not given. They run as the ball goes to short third man and he throws at the striker's end. Direct hit. Batsman is inside, so the appeal for run out is turned down as well

Hasan Ali takes the catch this time, in front of the long-on boundary. Smart catch as he gets down to his front. Pietersen was trying to loft it as the ball slides in with arm but does not middle it. Looks at the toe end of the bat, suggesting the ball went off there
length ball outside off, not much turn, whipped off the pads to the vacant gaps in the midwicket region and they come back for a sharp two
tries to slog and does not get hold of it, goes along the ground to long-on
fuller ball, uses the angle and sweeps behind square as the ball goes to the deep backward square leg boundary
loopy ball, drifting in in middle and spinning away, drops it into the off side off the front foot and takes off for a quick single
length ball outside off, enough width on offer and he picked up the length early, flays it over long-on and it comfortably gets over the fielder leaping back with outstretched hands
comes down the track to this short of a length ball and tries to heave it away through the leg side with an angled bat. But the ball is angled in and it cramps him for room and he cannot make contact
fuller outside off, tries to drive through the off side and ends up getting an inside edge to the back pad
short of a length and cutting back in slightly from outside off, stays in the crease and opens the bat face to steer it to third man
stays in the crease and goes after this wide delivery outside off without any feet and gets comprehensively beaten as the angle takes the ball away from him

full, wide, drills a drive through extra cover, to the right of Afridi and what a save from the not-so-young man. Runs back with all committment and puts in a full-length dive to forcefully pull it back. A catch was not taken off his bowling earlier on and he is now setting an example
drilled down to long-on for a single

short and wide, cuts off the backfoot to deep point. Sweeper cover runs across and collects it and they push for the second. Good throw needed and it comes at the keeper's end. Not the best of throws. Kamran does well to gather the ball and throw on to the stumps and he is short of the crease. Credit to the keeper there for collecting a slightly wayward throw
stays leg side of the ball to make room and flays this short of a length ball to backward point

comes down the track and there is extra pace and bounce on that delivery. Gets big on him and he is a long way away from the ball as well so he has to fetch the pull. Cannot find the middle of the bat. Chops it on to the stumps off the bottom part of the blade and Mahmudullah's short stint does not yield any runs
short of a length on the stumps, jumps up to ride the bounce and moves across to protect off-stump as he does so. Nudges to the leg side
short of a length, drops it into the off side off the backfoot and sets off for a quick single
slower ball, sprayed down the leg side
slower length ball outside off, taps from the crease with a flat bat and chops it towards point

brilliant caught and bowled by Hasan. Length ball, Nawaz was looking to slog it and ends up skying it. Can't get any sort of distance on it. Hasan settles under it nicely. The striker collides into him as he is completing the run and Hasan is trying to get in line of the ball. But that does not deter him as he judges it to perfection and pouches a smart catch. Took a similar one yesterday
fuller ball, gets the front leg out of the way and crunches a drive but straight to the fielder at extra cover

down the throat of Wahab at deep square leg. Goes for the slog and skies it again. Cannot clear the long boundary at the square leg region and Wahab takes the catch quite comfortably. Another well-judged catch
short of a length, drags it away to long-on with a flat bat and they take a quick single
yorker on the stumps, digs it out off the inside part of the bat to midwicket
slower length ball, stays leg side of it and tries to slog, misses as he goes through with the shot early
short of a length, tries to whip it away, gets into a bit of a tangle and I think it has gone off the glove into the leg side. Off the forearm, as replays tell us
tries to stay in the crease and open the bat face to run it down to third man. But the bounce is steep and it is too close so he gets beaten for room
short of a length, drops it in front of point

short of a length and tries to pull the ball, Gets a mild top-edge that barely goes up. Wahab runs forward on the follow-through and snaffles it. Seems like Gul isn't feeling too good after copping that blow on the forearm, grimaces as he walks off
short ball, gets a top-edge on the pull and the ball goes to backward square and drops short of Afridi running across from fine leg

short ball, drags a pull from outside off to midwicket. They come charging back for the second. Throw fired at the keeper's end by the fielder running across from long-on and Kamran takes his time to throw the ball onto the stumps. Batsman well short
sprays it down the leg side
down the leg side again and this time it misses the keeper as well as the ball runs down to the fine leg
same result, gets sharp turn as the ball goes down the leg side
oh, dear, will this over ever get underway! Same story. Down the leg side and this is some workout for the umpire.
comes forward to defend and gets an inside edge to the leg side
same story again, down the leg side and the bowler is as baffled as anyone else at the ground
full and coming on straight, tucked to midwicket
tucked to midwicket again
tucked to short midwicket for a brace
tucked off the backfoot to the leg side
stays in the crease and turns this away into the leg side, gets it just past the fielder at backward short leg
starts off with a wide delivery outside off and Kamran has to reach out for it as he taps it to covers
short and wide, slapped to sweeper cover
cut off the backfoot to cover-point as he sees width on offer
comes to the front foot to this length ball and defends to the cover-point fielder
tossed up on off, tries to sweep and gets beaten
punched off the backfoot down to wide long-on for an easy single
comes in with the arm and it is defended back to the bowler
swipes across the line at this tossed up ball and gets a leading edge back to the bowler
gets cramped for room and he mistimes the cut to covers
goes for a pull shot to this back of a length ball and wears it on the pad, sliding down leg
spinning away from middle and it is punched away to point
short of a length, fetches it from outside off and drags it to mid-on. And what do you know folks! Follows up a 11-ball first over with a maiden
sprayed down the leg side and called a wide. Another wide
length ball, stays in the crease and tucks off the pads to square leg
tossed up outside off, goes for the big drive and chips it just over the extra cover region
tossed up outside off and he drags this sweep from outside off to deep midwicket
slog sweep from Kamran. Drops short in front of the deep midwicket boundary and almost stops short in its track as Zulfiqar runs across from deep square leg and picks it up
makes room for himself before laying into a cut shot. Not much room and he cannot beat point
short of a length, manufactures width and flays it out to covers
draws the batsman forward with a pitched up ball and Tamim gets an inside edge to the pad before the ball goes to short fine leg
too short and he uses the sharp turn to get down on one knee and pull it away with the turn to deep square leg. Just in front of square, actually
tossed up on off, goes across and slogs it long and clean over cow corner. Similar to the one Ross Taylor plays
knocks it with the turn to mid-on for a quick single
presses forward and pushes this one into the off side. The ball goes square of the wicket and point runs in and picks it up as Tamim is sent back, looking for a run
starts off with a short ball, bounces steeply but not called a wide
short ball, takes is eyes off the ball as he tried to pull it, got hassled for pace and the ball goes to deep square leg
full and outside off, holding its line, Tamim leans forward and crunches a front foot drive to extra cover

tries to tuck this fuller ball into the leg side and misses, wears it on the pad instead as the ball rolls away into the leg side. Mills charges on the follow through to pick it up. And they take a leg bye. That ball was seriously quick, 146.4 clicks
length ball outside off, Tamim plays inside the line and the bat hits the pad as the ball goes to the wicketkeeper. Stifled appeal for caught behind and not given
fuller ball outside off, comes forward and crunches a drive to cover-point
gets down to sweep to short fine leg. Only one shouts the keeper and one it will be

that was kind of a needless shot to attempt after a good start in pursuit of a low total. Comes charging down the track and does not account for the spin at all. Gets beaten as he sticks his bat out in the channel outside off and gets beaten. Keeper does the rest
comes a long way forward and tries to flick it away but wears it on the pad. Big turn, would have taken it down leg
goes for a slog and gets an inside edge to backward square leg
short of a length and drifting in, swivels around and pulls it away to deep fine leg and the ball is cut off by the backward square leg fielder running across
comes down the track to meet the pitch of it and dispatches it over long-on. That was given an absolute thump, made a nice, loud sound as ball crashed into willow
god length, the angle takes it down the leg side as he tries to attack the stumps from around the stumps
fuller, tries to drive and gets an inside edge to mid-on

fuller ball, Akmal's bat face closes as he drills it through midwicket and there is a bit of a yes and no on the second run as Pietersen charges across from mid-on. He picks up the ball and throws it to Sarfaraz. And the keeper, for some sane reason, does not try to break the stumps. Had he tried to flick it back and hit the stumps, the batsman would have been well short. Think that is what Pietersen is telling his captain
worked away through square leg

what a catch! Samuels has another disappointing night. Amin was the substitute fielder, fielding close-in at forward short leg. Samuels tries to fend this short of a length ball off the hips. It is angled in on the body and he tries to flick it away, it hits the splice and seems to be flying over the forward short leg fielder but Yamin jumps up and back in a jiffy. Flew like a spark and takes it single-handed. Electric!
full and on the stumps, driven but cannot pierce the gap
slower bouncer, ducked under and it is called a wide
full and angling in on the pads, cannot make contact as he tries to clip it away. They don't make an appeal as that was clearly heading down leg

appeal for lbw and given. Kamran gets down to sweep and the ball is not full enough to sweep. It is on a length and he misses the ball, gets hit on the pad. Seems to be hitting in front of middle and leg. Kamran does not seem happy for some reason as he trudges off. Wicket off the first ball for Nawaz. He got a glove on that, actually
fetches a sweep from outside off and luckily for him it does not spin back enough and he works it out in front of square
flays it to mid-off with a flat bat and Ahmed Shehzad makes a diving save

oh, dear! Peshawar are unravelling here. Mix-up sees the back of Shakib. Hafeez pushes it to cover-point off the front foot. Shakib takes off for the run and Hafeez comes down a few steps before sending Shakib back but he has come down way too far and he has to go back. Too late, but
knocks it to mid-on with a closed bat face
defended off the backfoot
defended to the bowler

Maqsood gone and this Peshawar are sliding drastically here. Tries to go inside-out from the crease but fails to get to the pitch of the ball. The ball goes in the air to extra cover where Shafiq jumps up to snaffle a good, sharp catch. That came to him quickly but he did well there

and what does he do! Holes out to long-off first ball. Tries to loft the spinner down the ground but he only gets the elevation, not the distance. Probably went off the bottom part of the bat and Nawaz runs to his right from long-off to snaffle it in front of the straight boundary. Irresponsible shot from the captain, and Sammy goes right back from where he came

oh my, oh my! Nearly had the hat-trick. What drama! Afridi comes down the track to this full toss and does not get hold of the shot as he lofts it over mid-off. Long-off comes running in and dives forward and the ball falls inches, just inches in front of him. Got to wonder, why would you play that kind of a shot off a hat-trick ball
shuffles across to flick and ends up nudging it to midwicket as it comes on too close to him
short of good length, sits up nicely and it's a slow surface so he has ample time as the ball comes on to him slowly and he whips it away off the backfoot to deep midwicket
length ball, spinning away, Hafeez is slightly opened up as he defends it
length ball on off, pushed into the off side

gets it just over the fielder at midwicket. Mahmudullah it is. Short ball and it is pulled off the backfoot, clips the fingers of Mahmudullah as the ball goes to the boundary. Dropped chance but a very tough one
full on off, fends it off to midwicket
gives it too much air and bowls a full toss that is pushed down to long-on for an easy single
short again and they are not learning from their mistakes. can't be bowling there. pulled away into deep midwicket
flatter and short outside off, cut to point
floated up and drifting in with the arm, clipped off the toes to midwicket as he comes forward
short of good length and spinning away outside off, slapped uppishly out to sweeper cover. Picks the vacant spaces in the covers region
loopy and flighted, sliding in with the arm, nudged to mid-on with soft hands. That was a tad quicker too
short again but this one does not sit up as much and it is pulled along the ground to deep midwicket
floats it up and pitches it up outside off and Hafeez come sforward and pushes it into the off side
goodness, how much did that turn! slower through the air and on a length. Draws the batsman forward and Hafeez gets beaten as there is spitting turn and bounce
cut to point from the crease
goes full and drifts it in with the arm and it is clipped away behind square
Afridi advances down the track and goes hard as he tries to slog it away. But the drift in this delivery takes it in to the right-hander and he gets an inside edge as the ball goes to deep midwicket
short ball, comes on at a comfortable pace and it is pulled to deep midwicket for an easy single
spinning awya outside off from a length, blocked off the backfoot and he drops it in front of covers. Tries to take a quick single but Afridi is not interested
fuller, driven off the front foot to covers
short and wide, intercepts the cover-point fielder with the cut
Afridi plays watchfully at this length ball as he blocks into the off side
and as soon as he sees some width outside off, he opens up his arms and flays this cut shot to sweeper cover. Fumble by Mills allows the second run
fuller ball, driven watchfully off the front foot to covers
pitched up outside off, strides across and pushes it into the vacant covers region and they take the single by the time point can run across
drifting in with the arm on leg stump, Afridi pushes it into covers for a sharp single
short and some width on offer, opens the face of his bat and carves it to short third man
floated up and loopy full ball, draws the batsman forward and he watchfully drives to the off side
comes down the track and converts it into a half-volley. Gets on top of the bounce and drills it out to long-off
down the track comes Afridi. Does not seem like he has middled it but such is the power of the man. Goes high and straight and the ball has been dispatched over the boundary
good length and good pace - 141.8 kph - outside off, flays hard and gets beaten as he fails to slap it away
short ball, sits up nicely for Hafeez who pulls it through square leg. Man guarding the fence, so there will only be one
tries to stay legside of the ball and force it through the off side but gets beaten as the ball tails in late
fuller and angling, clipped off the pads to square leg and midwicket runs across to pick it up
nice change-up in pace. Slower and outside off, fullish length, defended with soft hands back to the bowler

slashes at this short and wide ball outside off and there is some steep bounce on that. Extra bounce accounts for him as the ball finds the edge on its way to the keeper. The noise was clear and Hafeez is off walking even before the finger can be raised
length ball on off, makes room and squirts it through covers
drifting in on a fullish length on leg stump, tries to go big over the leg side and gets an inside edge. Got yorked and the ball goes to the keeper

gets down to slog and this one is shorter than he would have liked and spins away sharply. Gets beaten. Cannot understand this approach when he should be looking to turn the strike over with Afridi at the other end
length ball, stabs it to long-off with a flat bat
follows the batsman with a fuller ball thayt drifts in and Afridi swings hard and dispatches this low full toss into the long-on stands
made room early. Zulfiqar makes the adjustment and fires it outside off, throws his bat at it and gets it through covers. Full toss again

gets it to slide in with the arm. Afridi moves away to make room and exposes all three stumps. The bowler follows him and he makes the most of the angle to launch it down the ground as the ball crosses the boundary on the bounce

it's the same thing again. Afridi makes room for himself and stays leg side. The bowler overadjusts and ends up bowling a half-volley, right under Afridi and he is able to use the angle and launches it over cow corner and this one sails clean over the fence

what a shot that is. Afridi moves the other way this time to protect off-stump and he plays a half-sweep, half-scoop as the ball goes off the top-edge to backward square leg. Saad Nasim, the substitute fielder, cannot get to it as he  runs back. Very tough chance
tries to make room and slap this short ball but is beaten by the extra pace and makes no contact
goes for a wild slog sweep and this one pitches on middle and spins away a mile outside off. Nowhere near the ball is Wahab and he gets comprehensively beaten
slower ball, gets the line wrong as he fires it down the leg side and Afridi cannot put it away fine
great delivery. Fires a length ball in the corridor outside off, a stump or two outside off and Afridi tries to run it down to third man with an open bat face. Extra pace gets him beaten
slower full ball, works it with the inward angle to short fine leg

gone, Wahab's gone. And his chancy stay comes to an end. Gets a feather as he slashes at this one from a long away. He is nowhere near this ball outside off as he was staying legside of it. Swings wildly and gets an outside edge for his troubles that his held comfortably by the wicketkeeper
pushes him back by generating pace. It's short of a length and the batsman jumps back to ride the bounce before bunting it straight back to the bowler

what a shot! That is a glorious cover drive. Is that the shot of the night or what! Full ball just outside off, right in the slot for Hasan and he lays into a cover drive. Sarfaraz watches it and grimaces. Half-volley outside off and what a time to be playing that shot. Glorious

overcompensates after giving him room outside off in the previous ball. Short of a length and tries to cramp him for room by firing it on leg, only that the drift takes it further down and it is down the leg side

lucky boundary. Bowls it at good pace and that proves to be the undoing of Mills here. Short and outside off. Hasan slashes hard and swings wildly. The ball takes the top edge and it goes over the third man region, one-bounce and into the boundary. What a spell this was from Mills and it has gone horribly wrong in the last two balls
short and wide outside off, poor delivery. Afridi moves towards room to make himself room and crashes it square of the wicket, through backwar dpoint and into the boundary

and that will be the game. What a heist from Zalmi. And Afridi the man. He never ceases to amaze and he has played a superb innings and pulled a rabbit out of the hat here. Slightly short of good length outside off and Afridi slaps it past the diving cover-point fielder
